editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-156r: Petition and Supplication for Seven Days, which God gave to Qerelos, Sǝ’ǝlät wä-‘asǝtäbǝqwu‘ot, ስእለት፡ ወአስተብቍዖት፡. . . በእንተ ሰብዓቱ ዐለታት, arranged for the days of the week: Monday (1r), Tuesday (20r), Wednesday (49r), Thursday (71r), Friday (102r), Saturday (124r), Sunday (141r). F-159v: Mystagogia, Tǝmhǝrtä Ḫǝbu‘at, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡. HTexte 48–72; Textes 40–52; Me‘erāf I 215–7; MG 9ff, written in a different hand. Notes: F. i r(ecto): record: secondary note of ownership, ወልደ ኢየሱስ. : record note of ownership: "This book belongs to Abba ገብረ ማርያም and Abba ጥጋቤ, who bought it with their money." F. ii r(ecto): Calculations for the feast days of the year. , 70v: Asmat prayer, and Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Mary, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡, written in a different and later hand. : Asmat Prayer for protection against snow, written in a later, different hand. : Asmat prayer against loss of blood in childbirth, written in a later, different hand. : Curse on anyone who damages the book. Illuminations: crude drawings are visible on ff. i r. The book has a spine strap with a discarded sheet from another book.
